name: Amrou Scout
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The people of Amrou were scattered by war and driven into hiding. Scouts maintain the beacon fires that signal "return" and "home."

name: Amrou Seekers
oracle_text: Amrou Seekers can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.
flavor_text: The paradise of Amrou Haven had become a field of cinders. Its people struggled to survive, hoping to see visions of its past in the strange storms that quickly passed.

name: Ancient Grudge
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: The time rifts remind Yavimaya of the enemies of its past and provide fresh fuel for its fires.

name: Assassinate
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: The rulers of old Dominaria kept assassins on retainer. However, the true loyalty of these master killers was always to their peers. This elite community survived the fall of the old royal order.

name: Aven Riftwatcher
oracle_text:
Flying
Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Aven Riftwatcher enters or leaves the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

name: Battering Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have trample.
flavor_text: Covered with hard shell-like plates, these slivers burrow through solid rock to carve out new nests for their hives.

name: Benalish Cavalry
oracle_text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "My people swore to protect Benalia to the end. It is battered, but yet stands, as do we."

name: Bewilder
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Teferi snapped his fingers, and the viashino started clucking like a chicken. Silly, yes, but exactly the thing we needed to break the stifling tension."
—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Blade of the Sixth Pride
flavor_text: "My pride may be gone, but our hunt is not over."

name: Blightspeaker
oracle_text:
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
{4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: One croaked sermon spreads propaganda and plague.

name: Bonesplitter Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +2/+0.
flavor_text: As the time streams grew more and more unstable, Dominaria's creatures struggled to adapt. The intense pressures led to many dead ends but also to lethal new forms that appeared as suddenly as the ashen rains.

name: Bound in Silence
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: A fight put off forever is already won.

name: Brute Force
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Blood, bone, and sinew are magnified, as is the rage that drives them. The brain, however, remains unchanged—a little bean, swinging by a strand in a cavernous, raving head.

name: Castle Raptors
oracle_text:
Flying
As long as Castle Raptors is untapped, it gets +0/+2.
flavor_text: "Each place we see is as ruined and lifeless as the last. So here we stay, because this ruin is *ours*."

name: Children of Korlis
oracle_text: Sacrifice Children of Korlis: You gain life equal to the life you've lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor_text:
"We have a proud history of self-sacrifice. But it is easy, in these bleak times, to find one among us who is eager to die for any cause."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Chromatic Star
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color.
When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text:
"This item is not from ... now. It reflects a sky no longer ours and gleams with hope that does not exist."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Citanul Woodreaders
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Citanul Woodreaders enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.
flavor_text: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.

name: Coal Stoker
oracle_text: When Coal Stoker enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text:
"The day is mine! I sent three such creatures against my foe, then watched as my magefire popped her soldiers like overripe spleenfruits."
—Dobruk the Unstable, pyromancer

name: Coral Trickster
oracle_text:
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Coral Trickster is turned face up, you may tap or untap target permanent.
flavor_text: They wait in darkened depths, laughing eagerly.
